client_profile_secondary_school_name: Liceo Artistico Statale Mario Sironi Sassari
client_description_Summary_Note:
Costanza Giovanna Ferrari and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Rome. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Costanza Giovanna Ferrari is a 21 year old and comes from Italy.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description_Family_Background: Costanza Giovanna Ferrari is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: Costanza received her secondary school diploma from Liceo Artistico Statale Mario Sironi Sassari in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Costanza Giovanna Ferrari is a 21 year old and comes from Italy.
Costanza Giovanna Ferrari did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1080000 EUR from her late grandfather, a renowned Stock Trader, in 2015.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
